meanings.definition: Most distant in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The furthermost star in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: The cabin at the furthermost edge of the forest was peaceful.
meanings.sent3: The furthermost cookie jar on the top shelf tempted the mischievous child.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed like a whisper from the furthermost corners of the room.
meanings.sent5: The furthermost island on the horizon seemed like a dream waiting to be explored.

meanings.sent1: His furthermost attempt to reach the top shelf failed.
meanings.sent2: The furthermost point of the map marked the end of their journey.
meanings.sent3: The furthermost slice of cake disappeared before anyone noticed.
meanings.sent4: The furthermost limit of her patience was finally reached.
meanings.sent5: The furthermost boundary of the forest held secrets untold.
